1�What to do...Move to the [ armada/ next] warship.Return to Tavnazia.Nothing.
1�What to do...Move to the [ armada/ next] warship.Return to Tavnazia.Nothing.
1�You dirty rat!Why don't you come down here and fight like a man!?
1�So she's not coming... I guess this means I'll never see her again.
1�Yeah, but to tell you the truth, I'd rather spend the next few weeks with Ulmia than I would with you.
1�Huh? What?
1�Did you hear that? Ulmia and Prishe, back together again on the trail of adventure!
1�Heh heh heh.Thanks, Ulmia.Now let's get moving!
1�Hey,  !Check it out! That old Cid's a genius!
1�The airship's been rebuilt shinier than Despachiaire's bald spot.Hell, with the autopilot Cid installed, it's even better than before!
1�We even got an escort from the Jeuno Armada!C'mon, let's get this baby back in the air!
1�Heh heh!We're bound for the fifth mothercrystal and beyond!Next stop: the legendary city of Al'Taieu!
1�The place where ten thousand years of history began.
1�No sweat!I'll be back making trouble before you know it.Let's go,  !

1�The new and improved  �[/Ultra /Hyper /Psycho /Eternal /Neo /Lovely /Pretty /Final /Extra /Deadly /Savage /Aero /Pseudo /Universal /Exciting /Celestial /Super /Mighty /Mega /Omni /Poly ] [/Terror /Perfect /Royale /Gorgeous /Pretty /Hell /Fantasy /Stealth /Powerful /Invincible /Explosive /Storm /Fantastic /Duper /Go-Go /Morphing /Retro /Sonic /Cloud /Sky /Stellar ] [/Hyper /Neo /Lovely /Happy /Caller /Hound /XI /Armored /Brutal /Buster /Alpha /Chief /Provoker /Mincer /Streak /King /Prince /Power /Robo /Delver /Mystic ] [C.I.D./Enterprise/Nautilus/Gilgamemnon/Redwing/Blackjack/Falcon/Highwind/Ragnarok/Hilda Garde/Prima Vista/Red Rose/Fahrenheit] is ready for take off!
1�Full speed ahead!
1�What the hell
1�The boy Selh'teus has already asked the Moblins to open the gate to the capital.
1�If you follow him, he'll lead you right to the fifth crystal.
1�I've told you what you want to know, now get out of here!
1�What are you talking about!? This is where it gets interesting!
1�Bahamut!Conqueror of the skies! King of the wyrms!
1�Damn!And you call yourself a guardian of Vana'diel!? Why didn't you tell us what you were going to do a long time ago!?
1�If you would've been honest with us, we could have been in Al'Taieu whipping that keeper's butt last week!
1�I'm sick of all this talk! Doesn't anybody here think we can handle the situation!?
1�Huh!?What do you mean, you don't know!? I'm telling you that you do!
1�Whoa, I have a bad feeling about this.
..� !Get out of the wa
1�Here comes the cavalry!
1�I know what you're thinking, samurai guy!But this is a battle without honor!
1�That flaming bird knew everything from the start, but failed to let you in on the facts.Why should you follow her orders now?
1�That's right!But I didn't lie to anyone!
1�I didn't bring   here to die!
1�  is here to join our struggle for survival!
1�I am Prishe!I am the Keeper of the Apocalypse!
1�Your pact with Selh'teus left me trapped for thousands of years.
1�And we will do it right here, right now! We will fulfill the pact!
1�Not the keeper!? But...
1�What if they discovered where Prishe was hiding!?
1�Louverance is moving the ship into position so we can board their vessel. Let us hurry below decks.
1�P-puppets..
1�Look!
e!�Prish
1�Take me with you. I still may be of some use. I haven't yet told you of the song I learned from Cardinal Mildaurion.
1�I feel that the song may be an important clue into solving the mysteries that lie before us.
1�Prishe, I'm... I'm so sorry...
1�I know you already know this, but let me say it anyway.
1�I do not have any of the special powers that you do.There is so much that I do not understand...
1�However, there is one thing I do know, and that is that I wish to travel with you and sing--sing your song.
1�It is you who introduced me to a world filled with song, and this is the only way I can repay you.
1�We...We couldn't find Prishe...
1�I fear that she is hiding somewhere on one of the armada's warships.
1�I think Prishe knows...that we would follow her.
1�Prishe can read the hearts of others. She knows what we feel and what we think--she knows what I feel...
1�But why does she continue on if she knows that her decisions will only hurt me...?
1�Why does believing hurt so...?
1�...Perhaps you are right, Jabbos. Perhaps the only option left to mankind is to change Vana'diel...
1�For the past ten thousand years, Vana'diel has grown and evolved to become what it is today--a world bound by the chains of an evil deity.
1�Prishe set out on her own in an attempt to change that world--our world...
1�Cid...Thank you so very much for all that you have done.
1�According to Aldo, the Jeuno Armada departed the Duchy after splitting into two units.
1�The main unit will enter Cape Riverne directly by air and attempt to draw the wyrms from the floating islands.
1�At the same time, the remaining unit will attempt to approach Bahamut from the opposite direction.
1�Engineer Cid said the same thing. This means we still have time!
1�Secret weapon?You wouldn't happen to be the same ??secret weapon?? that Cid received from Gilgamesh...would you?
1�Great Goddess of the Dawn.May your divine blessings protect the fifth mothercrystal--and the future of your children.
1�May your gentle gaze also watch over the safe return of Cardinal Mildaurion...
1�Oh my!
1�Nothing to envelop...?
1� !The attack seems to have subsided...
1�Something is going on over there... Something is wrong...
1�If we continue like this, both sides will end up exhausted without having made any progress!
1�We will be departing shortly for the San d'Orian Cathedral aboard Sir Louverance's airship.
1�I asked if you might accompany us, but they answered me with a hearty ??no.??
1�However, you need not worry,  . I will not take an eye off of Lady Prishe.
1�And if, by chance, San d'Oria breaks its promise and refuses to release her, I will do everything in my power to rescue the fair lady.
1�However, if there is one thing we must worry about, it is the amount of time we are losing with all this sidetracking. We can only hope the boy is not too far ahead of us...
1�Hm?Where is Lady Ulmia? Is she not accompanying us?
1�Yes, I sense we are to encounter much danger in our journey ahead. It is better that she stays here...for her own safety.
1�Lady Prishe. We all walk different paths in life. However, if those paths point in the same direction, there is a good chance that they will cross once again.
1�Lady Prishe! There are some opinions better left unspoken!
1� .We will await you at the San d'Orian Cathedral!
1�Master Cid!We have been waiting for your arrival!
1�A problem? What do you mean?
1�That cannot be possible!
1�Why did Lady Prishe not wait for you to return?
1�She is not planning to attack the Wyrmking, is she!?
1�Do you think there is any chance to catch up with Lady Prishe?
1�I assume that Prishe would be with the latter.
1�However, that unit cannot begin its operation until the main unit has successfully drawn the attention of the other wyrms.
1�Hmmm, we will be making contact with the armada shortly.
1�It may be to our advantage to have someone on board who can communicate with the
m.�What the..
a!�Warning shots?
1�The mothercrystals...
1�The origin of all life, and the destination for spent souls...
1�All return to the light of the closest crystal...
1�I have long awaited this moment.The moment you were bathed in the glow...
1�She is right, Lord Bahamut.
1�Such intolerant behavior does not befit the conqueror of the skies!
1�Why do you not believe in the power of the children of the dawn?
1�I expected nothing less from the light of hope...Never before has my blade failed me in battle.
1�So...Only the youth that seethes with Emptiness can extinguish that light...
1�You possessed the same knowledge, Lady Prishe!That is why you brought ?[Sir/Lady]   to this place!
1�You're wasting your breath, samurai man.
1�Get your hands off me, you pointy-eared brute!4
1�We've given up the fame and glory of being high-class Jeunoan officers!4
1�I say we go to the communications room!

1�Welcome to the  �[/Ultra /Hyper /Psycho /Eternal /Neo /Lovely /Pretty /Final /Extra /Deadly /Savage /Aero /Pseudo /Universal /Exciting /Celestial /Super /Mighty /Mega /Omni /Poly ] [/Terror /Perfect /Royale /Gorgeous /Pretty /Hell /Fantasy /Stealth /Powerful /Invincible /Explosive /Storm /Fantastic /Duper /Go-Go /Morphing /Retro /Sonic /Cloud /Sky /Stellar ] [/Hyper /Neo /Lovely /Happy /Caller /Hound /XI /Armored /Brutal /Buster /Alpha /Chief /Provoker /Mincer /Streak /King /Prince /Power /Robo /Delver /Mystic ]Cherukiki Flagship!
1�We've decided to find more suitable (and survivable) employment...
1�We totally forgot!
1�Yeah, they can't hear you--they're just puppets made by those crazy scientists in Jeuno!
1�Let us go, or you'll all be doomed!4
1�And decided to become high-class pirates!4
1�Shouldn't we be going to the communications room?

!?�Welcome to the  �[/Ultra /Hyper /Psycho /Eternal /Neo /Lovely /Pretty /Final /Extra /Deadly /Savage /Aero /Pseudo /Universal /Exciting /Celestial /Super /Mighty /Mega /Omni /Poly ] [/Terror /Perfect /Royale /Gorgeous /Pretty /Hell /Fantasy /Stealth /Powerful /Invincible /Explosive /Storm /Fantastic /Duper /Go-Go /Morphing /Retro /Sonic /Cloud /Sky /Stellar ] [/Hyper /Neo /Lovely /Happy /Caller /Hound /XI /Armored /Brutal /Buster /Alpha /Chief /Provoker /Mincer /Streak /King /Prince /Power /Robo /Delver /Mystic ]Kukki Battle Cruiser!
1�But since that would lead to certain death...
e!�It's a?`ll over.
1�How could we forget
1�And if you can't hear us, respond!
1�Yeah! We're your secret weapon!
1�The highest of the high, and classiest of the class, yes sir-ee!
1�A beautiful day for a sad announcement.
1�We've decided to give up our occupation as high-class pirates.
1�As a final high-class pirate duty, we were entrusted with this ship for the purpose of escorting Prishe safely to her destination.
..�It's over easy...
1�C-could she b-be...inside that thing...?
1�Even when...two hearts...are connected...there are times...when pain...can't be avoided...
1�When the world...is overwhelmed with...sadness...The only way...to escape the pain...is to...change the world...
.!�I can see them... The.
1�It's too...quiet...Could it be...the wyrms...haven't...noticed us...?
.?�Prishe!Are you okay!? If you can hear us, rrrespond!
1�What's going on!?
..�The Jeuno Armad
1�I wonder how the battle fares.
1�I will attempt to pull our ship up alongside theirs. Hold on!
1�I spoke with Ulmia earlier and do not feel that she possesses any information of use to the Kingdom. She is to remain here on the island.
1�The elder Despachiaire would not even allow her to come see us off. He is quite worried about his granddaughter, isn't he?
1�Interesting...Very well. You may accompany us to San d'Oria.
1�Master Cid, I ask that you allow me to fly her.
1�Lady Prishe!We have a transmission from the warship:
1�??Attention!Your most prized possession is now the property of the Chebukki Samurai Sky Pirates!??
1�What do you think you are trying to do, Nag'molada? You were relieved from your position within the Armathrwn Society and banished from Jeuno.
1�How dare you step over the boundaries of the amnesty you were granted and bring that creation aboard an armada vessel!
1�Did you think that by performing this ??service?? we would take you back?
1�Or was this cause of turmoil simply a desperate attempt to interfere with our plan--an attempt born from hate and despisal?
1�Or perhaps, you came to ask Bahamut the way to Al'Taieu...
1�Nag'molada.I understand why you seek the path to the celestial capital.
1�We who have lost the ??whisper of the soul?? are forced to live alone, trapped within our own wretched solitude.
1�However, that is our path to freedom.
1�We are children born from one.Now our children and our children's children step out into the ever expanding world.
1�This is much like when the mothercrystal split into five pieces long, long ago.
1�We were simply ready to leave the nest before the Zilart.
1�Return the favor...?A surprise attack
r?�...In Al'Taieu!?
1�And so that is why you planned to attack...!
1�There... There is still a way!
1�Bahamut!We need not fight Promathia...if we can stop the Keeper of the Apocalypse!
1�Selh'teus told us this! That is why he has returned!
1�He is here to stop Al'Taieu from falling back to this dimension!
!�Everyone, abandon ship!
1�Hah ha ha! The wonderful exhibition about to unfold will buy me more than enough time.
1�My ??pet?? is still far from completion. However, when she is finished, she will be the most powerful creation Vana'diel has ever seen!
1�Though those created ten thousand years ago may still be residing somewhere within the celestial capital of Al'Taieu...
e?�<Sigh>Not another distraction...Well, at least now I can test my pet in ??extreme battle mode.??
1�Ultima Weapon, show our friends what you can do.
1�<Sigh>I guess I cannot expect too much from a prototype...
1�...Then why did you choose to abandon your people and hide away in the Chamber of Eventide?
1�Why do you join the Zilart in blocking the path to Al'Taieu?
1�By entering the chamber, you succeeded in washing away the darkness of your soul.
1�That is why I seek the capital--so I can remove the darkness from my soul. So I can be free!
1�I see...Whether it has been buried or submerged, there is no place the Moblins cannot find...
1�And I was beginning to wonder when I was going to be able to see the boy once again. I have unfinished business with him...
!?�As much as I'd like to, it would be improper for me not to return the favor...
1�...the favor bestowed upon the Kuluu over ten thousand years ago!
!?�Ha ha ha!I see my song has reached the conqueror of the skies!
1�I am Kuluu!My strength comes from the protection of the terrestrial avatars. Without you, I am powerless!
1�The Zilart--those who have sworn revenge against Vana'diel--to you I offer these traitors as a sacrifice!
1�And that is why I must cleanse it!
1�I will find Al'Taieu and use the Chamber of Eventid
1�So this is what you meant, Esha'ntarl...
1�There is no need for you to prove anything, young Elvaan, for you are not the keeper.
1�Esha'ntarl...Children of Altana...And, Phoenix...
1�I commend you on what you are attempting to do for the people of Vana'diel. And that is why I will tell you this...
1�The true Keeper of the Apocalypse lies in the celestial capital of Al'Taieu.
1�Within that soul lies an immeasurable amount of darkness...
1�For ten thousand years it has slept... But now it has awoken...
1�Who was it that restarted the Crystal Line? Remnants of the Zilart? The children of Altana?
1�It does not matter, for now the power within the final crystal--the crystal that holds Al'Taieu in balance--has begun to fade.
1�It will not be long before the celestial capital has fallen to Vana'diel.
1�When this occurs, the Keeper of the Apocalypse will arise and envelop all life.
1�And finally the Twilight God, Promathia, will use his almighty power to begin his eternal reign.
1�That is why I have come... To stop the seeds of man from being wiped from Vana'diel.
1�If there is nothing for the keeper to envelop, then Promathia will not have the strength to enter our realm.
1�Why must I believe in something that does not exist?
1�You cannot defeat the Twilight God. You will not even be allowed to approach him.
1�Selh'teus proved that to us ten thousand years ago. Destruction is your destiny. You cannot escape what has already been decided.
1�Impossible!Selh'teus does not have the power to...
1�Damn you, Selh'teus...!
1�I will not let you harm Vana'diel and her children like you did once before!
.)� !It is just as Prishe said.You didn't fall from the airship after all.
1�Do you rrrealize what happened back there?
1�It was your actions that enraged the Wyrmking Bahamut.
1�The rift between dragons and people is deep.There was no rrreasoning with him.
1�If we could only harness the strength of the sleeping gods, we could approach Bahamut on equal footing...
1� , tell Tenzen to rrreturn to town before Cid's airship arrives. I want to leave as soon as possible.
1�Are you wounded...?Tell us...where...you are...hurt...
1�Think carefully...Wounds...of the spirit...can escape...your notice...
1�And they are...much more...dangerous...than physical...cuts and bruises...
1�If you are...wounded...this Moblin...medicine...can help...
1�Tenzen...said he...was fine...as well.But he...needs medicine...as much...as you.

1�The minstrel of melodies is my name,For a mere 
 gil I'd recall your past.But I find that you're lacking in cash or in fame,So until that time, my kind offer will last.

1�The minstrel of melodies is my name,For a mere 
 gil I'd recall your past.But I find that you're lacking in cash or in fame,So until that time, my kind offer will last.

1�The minstrel of melodies is my name,For a mere 
 gil I'll recall your past.Your stories of love, anger, triumph, and shame,The river of memories runs deep and vast.
1�Which memory will you have recalled?Nothing.Promathia Missions.Other Quests.

1�Which memory will you have recalled?Nothing.Slanderous Utterings.One to Be Feared(pt.1).One to Be Feared(pt.2).One to Be Feared(pt.3).One to Be Feared(pt.4).One to Be Feared(pt.5).One to Be Feared(pt.6).Chains and Bonds.Flames in the Darkness.Calm Before the Storm.The Warrior's Path(pt.1).The Warrior's Path(pt.2).On to Al'Taieu(pt.1).
1�Which memory will you have recalled?Nothing.Apocalypse Nigh.
1�You do not have enough gil.
1�Sueleen, look sharp!An airship is entering the port!
1�That ship...
1�Where are you off to this time, Prishe?
1�To where...!?You better make it back here alive, Prishe!
1�There's a whole lot more of them circling above.What the hell's going on?
].�That ship of yours made its way back here of its own accord.Must be that ??autopilot?? thing that Prishe was talking about.
1�I've resupplied the airship, so you can take off at any time.Are you ready to go?
1�Take the airship to Al'Taieu?Let's go!Not just yet.
1�You just missed them!Not more than a couple of minutes ago, an airship from Jeuno came and took Prishe and her friends away.
1�Ulmia said that they should wait for you, but Prishe said you'd find your own way back to the mainland...so they left.
1�I wonder if that means they'll be sending another ship...
1�If that's the case, those three Tarutaru should have waited instead of hiding away in those barrels.
1�You were asked to deliver all these letters from Ulmia and Prishe?
1�And I'm supposed to hand them out if those two fail to return...?
1�Where on Vana'diel are they thinking of going?You're not seriously thinking of taking on the wyrms...!?
].�That ship of yours made its way back here of its own accord.Must be that ??autopilot?? thing that Prishe was talking about.
1�The Sealion's Den once served as a private port for the Tavnazian Cathedral.
1�However, not a single ship has visited this place in over twenty years.I'm only stationed here to make sure no beastmen try to sneak their way into the safehold.
1�I never believed the day would come when I saw a ship docked in the Sealion's Den.
1�I have a feeling my job is about to become real interesting!
1�The airship carrying Prishe and Ulmia just left for San d'Oria.
1�Someday maybe I'll be lucky enough to ride an airship off the island... Someday...
1�Cid?No one going by that name has passed through here.
1�Ulmia told me that we may never see Prishe again...
1�...That Prishe is ready to sacrifice herself to the Wyrmking to save the world...
1�But you won't let that happen, will you,  ? You'll find a way to save Prishe, Ulmia, and everybody, right?
1�Over the past few months, hundreds of ships have brought thousands of people to our town.
1�It's like a clock that hasn't run for twenty years has suddenly started ticking again.
1�The Chebukki brothers arrived a while back on an airship that was unlike any that had visited our port before.
1�There were enough weapons on the contraption to blow up an island...
1�If you're looking for the Chebukki brothers, they headed back to Jeuno a few days ago.Now that you mention it, they looked like they were in quite a hurry.
1�I guess once you've had a taste of city life, it's hard to come back to the country...
1�Please, adventurer.Keep Prishe and Ulmia safe from harm.
1�I want to laugh as I hand back the letters they wrote in case they didn't make it...
1�I've brought Ulmia and Louverance with me.
1�But I'm sorry to say Prishe couldn't make it. There's been a bit of a problem.
1�Ulmia, would you be so kind as to fill Tenzen in on the details?
1�I have some business with Gilgamesh's little helpers.
1�I'm going to hitch a ride back to Bastok on Gilgamesh's boat and let the president in on what's going on.
1�Even if you are successful in stopping Bahamut, there's no knowing what his wyrm army might do. The Republic has to be prepared for the worst.
1�Heh heh. You know if I were only a few years younger, I'd be up there with you guys. But my place is back in Bastok. Gilgamesh made sure I didn't forget that.
1�And don't you forget that you're going up there to save your nations--no, to save all of Vana'diel!
1�Your lives will be on the line, but I know you'll be all right!

1�As long as you're riding my  �[/Ultra /Hyper /Psycho /Eternal /Neo /Lovely /Pretty /Final /Extra /Deadly /Savage /Aero /Pseudo /Universal /Exciting /Celestial /Super /Mighty /Mega /Omni /Poly ] [/Terror /Perfect /Royale /Gorgeous /Pretty /Hell /Fantasy /Stealth /Powerful /Invincible /Explosive /Storm /Fantastic /Duper /Go-Go /Morphing /Retro /Sonic /Cloud /Sky /Stellar ] [/Hyper /Neo /Lovely /Happy /Caller /Hound /XI /Armored /Brutal /Buster /Alpha /Chief /Provoker /Mincer /Streak /King /Prince /Power /Robo /Delver /Mystic ] [C.I.D./Enterprise/Nautilus/Gilgamemnon/Redwing/Blackjack/Falcon/Highwind/Ragnarok/Hilda Garde/Prima Vista/Red Rose/Fahrenheit], nothing can go wrong!
1�Wah ha ha ha!
1�She's all yours!Now get out of here...Warriors of the Crystal!
1� , I have awaited your arrival.
1�It is my fault that this terrible thing is occurring--I have no excuses.
1�I always feared that my act of relinquishing the Star of Tavnazia...
